Visa Direct is a global real-time money movement platform that facilitates various consumer and business-funded use-cases such as person-to-person (P2P) transfers, person-to-micro-business transfers (e.g., payouts to shared economy providers), funds disbursements (e.g., insurance claim disbursements and earned wage access), and more. The push payments market is estimated to exceed 80 trillion dollars in payment volume globally, replacing cash, checks, and slow bank transfers with real-time money movement. A robust, multifaceted enabler ecosystem is key to growth, as they facilitate the origination of Visa Direct transactions and services by merchants.
North America (N.A.) By constantly challenging ourselves to go further and do better, were developing the ground-breaking services that businesses will use, to revolutionize the way millions of people manage their money. The world of financial services is changing fast, and we will continue to be at the forefront of it.

About Engineering at Tink

Connectivity teams create software agents integrating data from 3400+ financial institutions. They ultimately focus on continual service improvements and enable real-time transactions and payment processing all around Europe and provide seamless authentication flows. Tink, as one of the first companies in Europe to initiate payments through open banking, so day-to-day work often means solving problems for which theres no blueprint. While Aggregation stores, refreshes and displays aggregated data from the thousands of financial institutions we connect to. With this data, we build products and APIs to solve problems like account aggregation, account verification, balance checks, and we support other Tink products.

At its core, Tink is a company dedicated to engineering and product development. As an Engineering Manager at Tink, your primary role involves fostering high-performing, engaged, and content teams that are continually learning. Your focus will be on developing superior products of exceptional quality, with the ultimate goal of ensuring our customers' success.

Tink offers you a dynamic work environment where you can grow and develop your skills, with opportunities for career advancement. You will have the chance to lead and shape the future of our engineering teams, and be part of a mission to deliver innovative and high-quality services to our customers.What were looking for
We are looking for an Engineering Manager who has a solid technical background, a business oriented mindset and sees the link between engineering and product development. Someone who is great at managing change and changing priorities, a person who can take ownership over the full delivery and the development of their team.
